content: Tara Salman, Ph.D. | Faculty | Department of Computer Science | TTU Texas Tech University Texas Tech Whitacre College of Engineering Department of Computer Science Faculty Tara Salman, Ph.D. Assistant Professor CS Email: tsalman@ttu.edu Phone: 806.834.3454 Office: EC 211D Mailing Address: Texas Tech UniversityDepartment of Computer ScienceBox 43104Lubbock, TX 79409−3104Research website Peronsal website Research Interests Distrubuted Intelligence Security and Privacy Cybersecurity Artificial intelligence and machine learning for networking applications Blockchains and distributed systems secuirty issues Personal Information Curriculum Vitae Education Ph.D., computer engineering, Washington University in St. Louis (2021) Master of computing, Computer Engineering, Qatar University (2015) B.Sc., computer engineering, Qatar University (2012) Department of Computer Science Like Department of Computer Science on FacebookLike Department of Computer Science on Facebook Follow Department of Computer Science on InstagramFollow Department of Computer Science on Instagram Connect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedInConnect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedIn Address Texas Tech University, Box 43104 | Lubbock, TX 79409-3104 Phone 806.742.3527 Email cs@ttu.edu © 2025 Texas Tech University Sep 15, 2025 4:38 PM
